content.question: Orenâ€™s father tells Oren he can have one dessert after dinner. He can choose from a scoop of ice cream, a slice of apple pie, a cup of chocolate pudding, or a piece of fruit. Oren prefers chocolate pudding to a piece of fruit; he prefers apple pie to chocolate pudding; and he prefers ice cream to apple pie. If Oren chooses a scoop of ice cream, what is his opportunity cost?

choices.label: A piece of fruit, a cup of pudding and a slice of apple pie.
